Harvard investigates 125 for cheating

Harvard University alleges that students shared answers in a take-home test in what may be the largest Ivy League cheating scandal in recent memory. (Globe)

Gas prices at record levels for holiday

Fuel prices in Mass. and nationwide are the highest ever heading into Labor Day weekend, causing some drivers to rethink travel plans for this weekend. (Boston Globe)

West Nile cases rise 40 percent in 1 week

So far this year, 1,590 cases of the mosquito-borne disease have been reported to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, and 66 deaths in the US. (AP)
